mapper.select: SELECT tud.udnum as udNum, tud.indate as indate, udid, udname, rdid, rdname, udmanager, extdate, intdate, pddate, devdate, estmate FROM tbl_unitwork_definition tud, tbl_unitwork_definition_detail tudd, tbl_project tp WHERE tp.udNum=#{udNum} AND tp.udNum = tud.udNum AND tud.udNum = tudd.udNum
mapper.update: INSERT INTO tbl_unitwork_definition_detail(udNum, udId, udName, rdId, rdName, udManager, extDate, intDate, pdDate, devDate, extmate) VALUES(#{udNum}, #{udId}, #{udName}, #{rdId}, #{rdName}, #{udManager}, #{extDate}, #{intDate}, #{pdDate}, #{devDate}, #{extmate})
DELETE FROM tbl_unitwork_definition_detail WHERE udNum=#{udNum} AND udId=#{udId}
